Richard George wrote:

> A good dissertation on lighting stuff is in a book called
> "color, light, and magic" (can't remember the author
> at the moment).

Richard I preserved your hard work of a couple years ago and I believe the book
you are referring to is:

> And FWIW, for those of you who really want to figure
> out the lighting, order a copy of Light Science & Magic by
> Hunter and Fuqua - I learned more about how to light stuff
> in the first couple of chapters than from the half dozen other
> books on photography/lighting I've read (and I've got the rest
> of the book to go :-) )

Best regards,

Barry Thomas
(Melbourne, Australia)
